reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater chic and on-trend, with a perfect fit that's true to size and comes in various colors.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater vest. I wear it with a white long-sleeve t-shirt under it and it looks and fits well. It's a tad boxy, but it hides my problem areas without being frumpy. I wash it in the machine and lay flat to dry. It still looks brand new and has not shrunk at all. The quality seems great and it is true to size. It's thick but breathable. I probably wouldn't wear this in the summer but I could see this being a good option for spring or late autumn. Read more
items.author: KatherineG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall top
items.body: Love how comfortable and stylish this top is. Read more
items.author: VaI

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I bought in several colors
items.body: Very nice sweater. Looks very expensive but is actually well priced. Feels and looks nice. My only complaint is that the neck is higher and tighter than expected. It washes well and the color stays true. Read more
items.author: Jenny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid staple addition to my closet.
items.body: At first I wasn’t sure about the color I ordered, apricot, but my husband convinced me to keep it. Apricot is definitely more apricot color than the beige that it appeared on my screen. The sweater is well made, soft, and washes and maintains its shape nicely. I wash on gentle cycle and hang to dry. I ordered my regular size small, 5’8” and 140 , and it fits very nicely, as advertised. The armholes are also a good size as my bra is not visible. I plan on ordering in another color as it will also make a great laying piece for the office. Read more
items.author: Runmomto4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to pair with skirts
items.body: Great sweater. Loose fitting, hits perfect to wear with skirts. Thick ribbed sweater material, not see thru at all. Washed well and true to size IG: @mjuchartz_styled Read more
items.author: Michelle Ann

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall, good with a few issues.
items.body: This was immediate buy for me as I have several sweaters from this company. The quality is always great and this is no exception. I live in Florida so heavy sweaters are not one that much. This is a lightweight, smooth silky type sweater vest. I ordered the white, but it really is more of an off-white creamy color not a bright white like shown . I will wear this with a denim or corduroy jacket over it.. I am very happy how it feels and how it looks on. It is true to size. I have not worn it yet, but I will hand wash this at first and definitely hang to dry. There are absolutely no directions on how to wash or dry this so I took off a star for that because that is very important especially if you buy this as a gift. Often when you go on the website, the directions are different than in the actual garment which is always more reliable. There’s nothing in this at all either on the tag attached or the tag inside the garment. The page does say machine wash, but I don’t think this will hold up in the machine. Read more
items.author: Timkatmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish & warm
items.body: Love this top, it’s great to thrown on for layering or wear by itself. Stylish, warm, not itchy, comes up to neck for good coverage Read more
items.author: Zane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!
items.body: Great material. Fits amazingly well. Read more
items.author: Liz

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Maroon, Nutmeg, Rust, Blue, Deep Brown, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Deep Grey, Khaki, White, Red Apricot, Purple, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
